body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Dealership Support. My name is Mark Bryant. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Mark, my name is Angela Bell.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Angela. Could you provide me with your email address so we can verify your account?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is angela.bell@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Angela. And could you confirm the last four digits of your phone number for security purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The last four digits of my phone number are five six seven eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Angela. Is there anything specific you need help with today regarding billing or any other concern?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I received a bill that had higher charges than expected, and I'm feeling surprised by it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Angela. Let me review your account to see what may have caused the discrepancy. Thank you for your patience.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information with me, Angela. I will investigate this further and follow up with you shortly. Thank you for contacting us today. Have a great day!
